text: Three ships of the United States Navy have been named USS Vermont in honor of the 14th state. * The first was one of nine ships of the line authorized by Congress in 1816, but it was not launched until 1848, and only ever saw service as a receiving ship, from 1862 to 1901. * The second was a * The third is a ==See also== *SS Green Mountain State (T-ACS-9), an auxiliary Keystone State-class crane ship launched in 1964 currently in ready reserve since 1992. Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Vermont
